sections.heading: Compact; authority to join5-131
sections.text: Compact; authority to joinThe department of gaming and the racing commission may join with other states in an interstate compact on licensure of participants in live racing with pari-mutuel wagering as follows:Article IRights and Responsibilities of Each Party StateSe

sections.heading: Rights and responsibilities of each party state.
sections.text: Rights and responsibilities of each party state.
